name: Dark Side (itch)
description:
This game was made for the JamCraft 3 game jam, from June 11 - 23, 2019. The jam had a required theme of crafting, with an optional theme of "dark." The game was made by Luke Kline (lead programmer) and Colby Snyder (lead artist and sound designer) using Unity, and it is the first game that we have ever made.

Font - Titillium

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Titillium+Web
